Class Item

  • java.lang.Object

    public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Item>
    Classe represent un item d'un conjunt items

      • setPes

        public static void setPes​(int a,
                          float pes)
                   throws src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemWeightNotCorrectException,
                          java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
        Sets the weight of column
        Parameters:
        a - column which will be modified
        pes - new weight that will be assigned
        Throws:
        src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemWeightNotCorrectException - if weights is outside the range (0 - 100)
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - if the column is not between 0 and the number of attributes

                            java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
        Sets the weights array to the parameter
        Parameters:
        p - array of weights
        Throws:
        src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemWeightNotCorrectException - if any weights is outside the range (0 - 100)
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - if the array is not the size of the attributes

                                       Item.tipus t)
                                throws src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemTypeNotValidException
        Checks what happes if an attribute changes to type t
        Parameters:
        atribut - column where the change is being made
        t - new type for that column
        Throws:
        src.recomanador.excepcions.ItemTypeNotValidException - if item has an id and another id is trying to be set

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo​(Item otherItem)
        Function that overrides the compareTo by defalut. Compares 2 items by their id's
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Item>
        Parameters:
        otherItem - The other item that compares
        Returns:
        Returns an integer depending on the comparisson between the implicit item and the item given as a parameter 1 if implicit > otherItem, 0 if implicit = otherItem, -1 if implicit < otherItem
